{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":44851,"originalJapaneseLine":"アレックス、の一言で、エロピチャはなんとなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"With just the word 'Alex,' Eropicha somehow sensed"},{"lineNumber":44852,"originalJapaneseLine":"訪問した意図を悟った。","translatedEnglishLine":"the intention behind the visit."},{"lineNumber":44853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ちょっと、場所を移しましょうか〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Shall we move somewhere else for a bit~?"},{"lineNumber":44854,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お客さんは少ないけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"There's not many customers, but"},{"lineNumber":44855,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここじゃない方がいいみたいだし〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"it seems better not to be here~\""},{"lineNumber":44856,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":44857,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは小さく頷いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic nodded slightly,"},{"lineNumber":44858,"originalJapaneseLine":"黙ってエロピチャに付いていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and silently followed Eropicha."},{"lineNumber":44859,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は、昼下がりの公園にやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two came to a park in the early afternoon."},{"lineNumber":44860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの、アレックスの事、その……ごめん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, about Alex, that... I'm sorry..."},{"lineNumber":44861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃなくて、ええと……気にしないで……","translatedEnglishLine":"No, wait... never mind..."},{"lineNumber":44862,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でもなくて……その、元気、だして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that's not it... um, please cheer up...\""},{"lineNumber":44863,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うん。仕方ないわ〜、戦争だもの〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah. It can't be helped — it's war after all~\""},

{"lineNumber":44864,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロピチャは少し困ったように眉を寄せただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Eropicha just furrowed her brows a little in concern,"},

{"lineNumber":44865,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっけらかんと返した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and replied cheerfully."},

{"lineNumber":44866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、でも…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But...!\""},

{"lineNumber":44867,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねぇ、マジック。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Magic."},

{"lineNumber":44868,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレックス様は……無駄に死んだの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Did Lord Alex... die in vain?\""},

{"lineNumber":44869,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ……違う、違うわ、それは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, no, that's not it..."},

{"lineNumber":44870,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間稼ぎだったけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a delay tactic, but..."},

{"lineNumber":44871,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私たちには、それはすごく大事な、時間で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"For us, that was a very important time...\""},

{"lineNumber":44872,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無駄なんかじゃ、ない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It wasn't wasted..."},

{"lineNumber":44873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無駄に、させて……たまるもんですか、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"No way will we let it be wasted...!\""},

{"lineNumber":44874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう〜。世界を守るために〜、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right~. He fought to protect the world~,"},

{"lineNumber":44875,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦って……散ったのね〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"fought... and fell~\""},{"lineNumber":44876,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ…………うん、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":44877,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それなら〜、冥福を祈ってあげましょう〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If that's the case~ let's pray for his peaceful rest~."},

{"lineNumber":44878,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっと天国から、心配そうに見てるわよ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sure he's watching worriedly from heaven~\""},

{"lineNumber":44879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..................\""},{"lineNumber":44880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう。私より、マジックが哀しんでどうするの〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez. How can Magic be sadder than me~?"},

{"lineNumber":44881,"originalJapaneseLine":"　顔、ぐしゃぐしゃよ〜。ほら」","translatedEnglishLine":"Your face is all scrunched up~. Here."},

{"lineNumber":44882,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、っ……うん……でも、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm... yeah... but...\""},

{"lineNumber":44883,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼろぼろと、マジックの目から","translatedEnglishLine":"Tears streamed down heavily from Magic's eyes."},

{"lineNumber":44884,"originalJapaneseLine":"大粒の涙がこぼれ出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Large drops of tears spilled out."},

{"lineNumber":44885,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを、エロピチャはハンカチで拭う。","translatedEnglishLine":"Eropicha wiped them away with a handkerchief."},

{"lineNumber":44886,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう……あ、もしかして、好きだったの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez... Ah, could it be you liked,"},

{"lineNumber":44887,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレックス様のこと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Alex...?\""},{"lineNumber":44888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス総統より、アレックス様がよかったの〜？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you like Lord Alex more than Supreme Leader Rance~?"},

{"lineNumber":44889,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふふ、スシヌちゃんもいるのに、これは問題よ〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, even though Sushi Nu-chan is here, this is a problem~\""},

{"lineNumber":44890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........\""},

{"lineNumber":44891,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックは首を振った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Magic shook her head."},

{"lineNumber":44892,"originalJapaneseLine":"けれど、涙は止まらなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"But the tears didn't stop."},

{"lineNumber":44893,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"..................\""},{"lineNumber":44894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふぅ、とエロピチャはひとつ息を吐いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Eropicha exhaled softly."},

{"lineNumber":44895,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、ふっくらした身体で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, with her plump body,"},

{"lineNumber":44896,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックを抱きしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"she embraced Magic."},

{"lineNumber":44897,"originalJapaneseLine":"「エロピチャ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eropicha...\""},

{"lineNumber":44898,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………がんばりましょ〜？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Let's do our best, okay~?\""},

{"lineNumber":44899,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、く……うん…………うん…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... yeah... yeah...!\""},

{"lineNumber":44900,"originalJapaneseLine":"マジックに、見られないようにして。","translatedEnglishLine":"Trying not to be seen by Magic."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックス、の一言で、エロピチャはなんとなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With just the word 'Alex,' Eropicha somehow sensed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 訪問した意図を悟った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the intention behind the visit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ちょっと、場所を移しましょうか〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Shall we move somewhere else for a bit~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お客さんは少ないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's not many customers, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここじゃない方がいいみたいだし〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems better not to be here~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは小さく頷いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic nodded slightly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黙ってエロピチャに付いていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and silently followed Eropicha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は、昼下がりの公園にやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two came to a park in the early afternoon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、アレックスの事、その……ごめん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, about Alex, that... I'm sorry...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃなくて、ええと……気にしないで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, wait... never mind...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもなくて……その、元気、だして……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's not it... um, please cheer up..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……うん。仕方ないわ〜、戦争だもの〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Yeah. It can't be helped — it's war after all~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロピチャは少し困ったように眉を寄せただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eropicha just furrowed her brows a little in concern,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっけらかんと返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and replied cheerfully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねぇ、マジック。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックス様は……無駄に死んだの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did Lord Alex... die in vain?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ……違う、違うわ、それは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-No, no, that's not it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間稼ぎだったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a delay tactic, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私たちには、それはすごく大事な、時間で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For us, that was a very important time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無駄なんかじゃ、ない……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It wasn't wasted...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄に、させて……たまるもんですか、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way will we let it be wasted...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう〜。世界を守るために〜、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right~. He fought to protect the world~,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦って……散ったのね〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fought... and fell~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それなら〜、冥福を祈ってあげましょう〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case~ let's pray for his peaceful rest~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと天国から、心配そうに見てるわよ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure he's watching worriedly from heaven~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう。私より、マジックが哀しんでどうするの〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez. How can Magic be sadder than me~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔、ぐしゃぐしゃよ〜。ほら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your face is all scrunched up~. Here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、っ……うん……でも、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm... yeah... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろと、マジックの目から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tears streamed down heavily from Magic's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大粒の涙がこぼれ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Large drops of tears spilled out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを、エロピチャはハンカチで拭う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eropicha wiped them away with a handkerchief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう……あ、もしかして、好きだったの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez... Ah, could it be you liked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックス様のこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Alex...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統より、アレックス様がよかったの〜？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you like Lord Alex more than Supreme Leader Rance~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふ、スシヌちゃんもいるのに、これは問題よ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, even though Sushi Nu-chan is here, this is a problem~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは首を振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic shook her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けれど、涙は止まらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the tears didn't stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふぅ、とエロピチャはひとつ息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eropicha exhaled softly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、ふっくらした身体で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, with her plump body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックを抱きしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she embraced Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エロピチャ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eropicha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………がんばりましょ〜？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's do our best, okay~?"
"Ugh... yeah... yeah...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックに、見られないようにして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying not to be seen by Magic.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: fought... and fell~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それなら〜、冥福を祈ってあげましょう〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that's the case~ let's pray for his peaceful rest~.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと天国から、心配そうに見てるわよ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm sure he's watching worriedly from heaven~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう。私より、マジックが哀しんでどうするの〜。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez. How can Magic be sadder than me~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 顔、ぐしゃぐしゃよ〜。ほら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your face is all scrunched up~. Here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、っ……うん……でも、っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm... yeah... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろぼろと、マジックの目から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tears streamed down heavily from Magic's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大粒の涙がこぼれ出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Large drops of tears spilled out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを、エロピチャはハンカチで拭う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eropicha wiped them away with a handkerchief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう……あ、もしかして、好きだったの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez... Ah, could it be you liked,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレックス様のこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Alex...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統より、アレックス様がよかったの〜？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you like Lord Alex more than Supreme Leader Rance~?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふ、スシヌちゃんもいるのに、これは問題よ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, even though Sushi Nu-chan is here, this is a problem~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックは首を振った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic shook her head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けれど、涙は止まらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the tears didn't stop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふぅ、とエロピチャはひとつ息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eropicha exhaled softly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、ふっくらした身体で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, with her plump body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックを抱きしめる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she embraced Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エロピチャ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eropicha..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………がんばりましょ〜？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Let's do our best, okay~?"
"Ugh... yeah... yeah...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックに、見られないようにして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Trying not to be seen by Magic.
